generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending across the frame, including the area where vehicles are driving and pedestrians are crossing.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with trees and buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the image, including residential and commercial structures along the street and taller buildings in the background.
- fence: A blue fence is visible on the left side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, mounted on poles.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign, a circular speed limit sign, and a "No Entry" sign.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the road and sidewalks, providing greenery to the urban environment.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the grassy areas along the roadside and in the median.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Two people are visible crossing the road, walking together.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including those parked and those in motion.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the crosswalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the crosswalk.
